page.title: 11A TRUE STORY FROM ALLENDALE
page.content:
In one of our surveys for the project,we found a man who wrote down this true story using the Allendale dialect. "Nearly forty years ago my Grandmother told me this story:the setting is Allendale in 1883.
Yen neet i' the darkenin afor we gat the lamp let,thaer come a rap at the door.Mother says to me,"whae in the world cun that be at this time o'neet? Gan thoo lass an'see.So a'tyek off me clooty_hat an'gav a bit keek i' the sin_glass,then away aa gans.When aa'd gitten the door unbarred it was John Robert Walton,cummed a' theways frae Keenley at Whitfield,wheer oor Joesph wrowt;he was the youngest amang five on us."Hello Lizzie hinny,"he said,"is thee muther at haem?""Ay cum on in",as says."Thoos gien us sec
